nodes.text: Alderaan Select Academy for Young Ladies

The Alderaan Select Academy for Young Ladies was a school on Alderaan for upper-class girls, with Madame Vesta as the headmistress. All the daughters of nobility, including Leia Organa, attended. Students wore white and blue uniforms. According to Leia, a number of the students exhibited "self-destructive" behavior.
In 0 BBY it was destroyed along with Alderaan itself.
